bibl.title: Corinna of Tanagra on Poetry.
bibl.note: Introduction. - The Muses. - The Lyric Tradition. - The Musical Contest. - Conclusion. - D.L. Page and M.L. West point to a late date, around 300. The present analysis, working from the reconstruction of an ars poetica, tends to suggest an earlier dating. But it is by no means decisive.
bibl.seg: HENDERSON W.J., Corinna of Tanagra on Poetry.

Introduction. - The Muses. - The Lyric Tradition. - The Musical Contest. - Conclusion. - D.L. Page and M.L. West point to a late date, around 300. The present analysis, working from the reconstruction of an ars poetica, tends to suggest an earlier dating. But it is by no means decisive.
